GSD37gautdhcu:577: athavā yatra yatra śaucamuktaṃ tatra tatrādbhireva śaucaṃ prathamaṃ kāryamityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:578: yathā mṛdā adbhiriti samuccīyate tathā bhasmādibhirapi samuccayārtho visamāsaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:579: taisajādīnāṃ dravyāṇāmuktatvāt idaṃ śaucaṃ śarīrāvayavasyāmedhyaliptasya draṣṭavyam //
GSD37gautdhcu:582: visraṃsanaṃ nirasanaṃ, tat mūtrapūrīṣasrehūṇāṃ pratyekaṃ sambadhyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:585: bhuktvā'; ityanena siddhatvāt lepagandhāpakarṣaṇaṃ ca mṛtsalilaprakṣālanena kuryāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:586: evaṃ ca 'tadadbhiḥ pūrvam'; ityatra yaduktaṃ cūrṇādinā annalepāpakarṣaṇaṃ tenāśakyamidaṃ draṣṭavyam
GSD37gautdhcu:592: mūtrapurīṣalepānannalepānucchiṣṭalepān retasaśca ye lepāstān prakṣālya pādau cācamya prayato bhavati'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:599: āmnāyo vedaḥ, sa yatra yajñaviṣaye sphyādīnāṃ prakṣālanamātrādeva śuddhiṃ
GSD37gautdhcu:600: vidadhyāt tatra tadeva, na dārusāmānyena takṣaṇādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:601_0: atulyabalatvādevedaṃ siddhamiti cet śrutyuktasya laukike ananupraveśanārtha upanyāsaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:601_1: yathār davyā yāgaviṣaye śrutyā prakṣālanena śuddhiruktā, tasyā laukike vyāpṛtāyā
GSD37gautdhcu:601_2: api darvīsāmānyena śrutyuktā mā bhūt smṛtyuktāmeva
GSD37gautdhcu:604: sa yatra śaucaṃ vidadhyāt tatra tadeva, yathā 'yatīnāṃ tu caturguṇam';
GSD37gautdhcu:606: taduktatvādevāsandeha iti cet ucyate- yasminviṣaye na kiṃciducyate tatra smṛtyantaroktaṃ bhavati
GSD37gautdhcu:607: yatra lepagandhāpakarṣaṇādi kiṃciducyate tatra smṛtyantareṇa vikalpaśaṅkā bhavatīti tannirāsārthamuktaṃ 'yatra cāmnāyo vidadhyāt'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:612: pāṇinā dakṣiṇena savyaṃ pāṇimanaṅguṣṭhavarjitaṃ gṛhītvā adhīhi bho iti prārthayeta gurumadhyāpakam
GSD37gautdhcu:627: prāṇāyāmaḥ prāṇanirodhaḥ nirucchvāsenāvasthānaṃ, te trayaḥ kāryāḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:645: savyena savyaḥ spṛṣṭavyo dakṣiṇena tu dakṣiṇaḥ // iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:655: anujñāta upaviśetprāṅmukho dakṣiṇataḥ śiṣya udaṅmukho vā // Gaut_1.60 //
GSD37gautdhcu:656: ācāryeṇādiṣṭaḥ tasya dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vopaviśet saṃbhavato vikalpaḥ āsīnasyācāryasya yathā tadabhimukho bhavati tathā prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vā upaviśedityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:659: 'anujñāto dakṣiṇataḥ'; iti ca niyamārthaḥ nānanujñāta upaviśennādakṣiṇata iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:666: tripadā caiva gāyatrī vijñeyā brahmaṇo mukham // iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:674: atra kramaḥ prātarutthāya pādaupasaṅgrahaṇaṃ, tadāhūya upaviśet darbheṣu,
GSD37gautdhcu:675: tataḥ prāṇopasparśanaṃ darbhaiḥ, tataḥ prāṇāyāmānkṛtvā mahāvyāhṛtīḥ pañca
GSD37gautdhcu:676: uktvā, añjalinā 'adhīhi bhoḥ'; iti gurumāmantrya, oṅkārapūrvikā vyāhṛtīḥ sāvitrīṃ coktvā praṇavapūrvamadhīyīta /
GSD37gautdhcu:677: prathamādhyayana evāyaṃ vidhiḥ kutaḥ ? sāvitrī cānuvacanaṃ tato 'dhīyīteti
GSD37gautdhcu:685: yadyadhīyatāmantarā madhye kaścidgacchettataḥ punarapi pādopasaṅgrahaṇādipraṇavoccāraṇānto yo vidhistaṃ kuryāttasya prāyaścittārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:696: śvādīnāṃ pratyekamantarā manage tryahaṃ bhaktatyāgaḥ prāyaścittaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:718: tatastrīnprāṇāyāmān dhārayitvā ghṛtaṃ prāśyopasadanaṃ ca kṛtvādhīyīta,
GSD37gautdhcu:727: cakārādanantaroktasya praṇāyāmādeḥ sarvasya prāptau evaṃśabdena anantaroktasyopasadanasyaiva prāptiḥ kriyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:728: tarhyevaṃśabda eva vaktavya iti cet na, ubhayasakāśa evāyamartho labhyate
GSD37gautdhcu:729: kathaṃ ? evaṃśabde caśabde vā vaktavye ubhayapāṭhasya prayojanāntaraṃ
GSD37gautdhcu:732: tathāca smṛtyantaraṃ-'śmaśānasamīpe 'dhītya prāṇān dhārayet prāṇopasparśanamabhivādanaṃ sāvitryanuvācanaṃ'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:743: nanu ca prāgevopanayanādetadvaktavyaṃ, tatra prāgupanayanādityetanna vaktavyaṃ bhavati
GSD37gautdhcu:747: na ca niyamyate, avaśyakartavyābhāvāt, 'upanayanādirniyamaḥ'; iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt pākṣikatvābhāvācca
GSD37gautdhcu:750: ataḥ idaṃ sūtramanuvādakaṃ prāyaścittarājadaṇḍābhāvajñāpanārthaṃ, tayoḥ sāmānyenopadiśṭatvāt
GSD37gautdhcu:751: nanu ca rājadaṇḍaprāyaścittāni ca vihitākaraṇe niṣiddhasevane vā vidhīyante /
GSD37gautdhcu:754: na cāsya vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā śrūyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:755: na tvasyāhutāttvādi vidhāyiṣyate pratiṣidhyate vā, yadvyatikrame ubhayaṃ bhaviṣyatīti, pitrādīnāmupadeśāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:757: atrocyate-yadvihitākaraṇe pratipiddhasevane vā prāyaścittamuktaṃ rājadaṇḍo vā tadubhayamasyāpi prāpnotyeva /
GSD37gautdhcu:758: yadyapyasyaivoddeśena vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā na śrūyate, tathāpi yattu sāmānyenoktaṃ 'ahiṃsā satyamasteyam'; ityādi, tdavarṇadharmatvādasyāpi prāpnoti /
GSD37gautdhcu:762: vidhirucyate-tadvyatikrame eva prāyaścittaṃ nānyavyatikrame iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:765: tathāpi nityopanayanakālātītasya bhinnabuddheḥ śaktasya ekādaśavarṣādūrdhvaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣātprāk
GSD37gautdhcu:766: tator'vāk pañcavarṣādūrdhvaṃ pitrādīnāṃ prāyaścittapraveśārthaṃ, tata arvāgaparādhābhāvajñāpanārthaṃ ca sūtramārabdham /
GSD37gautdhcu:773: rājadaṇḍaśca tasyātaḥ prāyaścittaṃ ca neṣyate // iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:777: pitrādibhiḥ, tadvyatikrame bālasya sataḥ pitrādīnāṃ prāyaścittasya śravaṇāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:779: idānīṃ sūtraṃ vivriyate-upanayanātprākkāmacāra icchāgatiḥ tasmāccaṇḍālasparśanādau prokṣaṇamātraṃ vakṣyati 'avokṣaṇebhyaḥ'; iti tadapi pañcavarṣātprāgevetyuktam /
GSD37gautdhcu:792: kāmavāde abhiśaṃsādau kāmabhakṣaṇe surāpānādau cātyantavālyāvasthāyāmapi yatnato nivārayitavya-, kāmacāra ityanenaiva siddhe vādabhakṣaṇayoḥ punarupanyāsāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:793: upanayanāditi vaktavye prāggrahaṇaṃ niyamārthaṃ, upanayanātprāgeva kāmacāritvādīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:794: asati niyame 'uttareṣāṃ caitadavirodhi'; ityanena hutaśiṣṭabhakṣaṇavarjanādi yatīnāmapi prāpnotīti
GSD37gautdhcu:797: hutaṃ hutaśiṣṭaṃ carupuroḍāśādi, na vaiśvadevaśiṣṭaṃ, tasya sarvārthatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:806: yathāpariveṣṭitaśirasaḥ kṛṣṭādāvapi mūtrapurīṣāvutpadyete tiṣṭhato vā tathā tatraiva kuryādityarthaḥ
GSD37gautdhcu:811: tatra 'śūdreṇa hi samastāvadyāvadvedena jāyate'; iti smṛtyantare śūdreṇa
GSD37gautdhcu:820: asyonapañcavarṣasyāpamārjanādibhyaḥ anyatra kiñcidapi śaucaprakāraḥ na vidyata ityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:825: anyatrāpamārjanapradhāvanāvokṣaṇebhyaḥ'; iti pratiṣedhadvayasyānārambhaḥ prāpnotīti cet, naiṣa doṣaḥ, 'nāsyācamanakalpo dyitate';
GSD37gautdhcu:833: tarhyasya śaucavidhānamanarthakaṃ, kutaḥ ? dvayameva prayojanaṃ śaucavidhānasya dṛśyate itarasparśayogyārthamanuṣṭhānārthaṃ ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:834: asya tu itarasparśayogyārthaṃ na bhavati, akṛtaśaucasyāpi sparśayogyatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:840: evaṃ cānyeṣāmucchiṣṭakṛta mūtrapurīṣāṇāṃ sparśane ācamanaṃ kartavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:843: aśuciṃ spṛśate yastu eka eva hi duṣyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:844: taṃ spṛṣṭvānyo na duṣyeta sarvadravyeṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ // iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:847: 'tamupaspṛśet'; iti vaktavye 'na tadupasparśanādaśaucam'; iti gurasūtrakaraṇaṃ prāgupanayanādityatra niyamamyāpi bādhanārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:854: tuśabdo viśeṣavācī, aṣṭakādau brāhmaṇapādaprakṣālanādāvapi na niyuñjyāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:856: kāmacāritvādyatrakutracinmantramadhītyāgnihotrādau yadi svayameva pravartate tadā taṃ dṛṣṭvānumantāpi na syādityevamartha evaśabdaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:858: evaṃ ca 'vidvānāgnihotraṃ juhuyāt'; iti yadyapi śrutyā
GSD37gautdhcu:862: naiva kanyā na yuvatirnālpavidyo na bāliśaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:865: tatrālpavidyapratiṣedhādeva pratiṣedhe siddhe nāsaṃskṛta iti pratiṣedho
GSD37gautdhcu:868: kutaḥ ? 'vaivāhiko vidhiḥ strīṇāmaupanāyanikaḥ smṛtaḥ'; iti smṛtyantaradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:869: evaṃ cāgnihavanabalirharaṇayoḥ kanyāyā api niyogapratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:871: tatra 'na strī juhuyāt'; iti śrutyāgnihotre pratiṣiddhatvāt aupāsanādau draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:872: tathā ca smṛtyantaraṃ-'patnyaupāsanaṃ juhuyādvaiśvadevaṃ ca'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:879: upanītasyopākaraṇādūrdhvaṃ 'adhīyīta chandāṃsi'; ityanena vedādhyayanavidhānādevānupanītasya pratiṣedhe siddhe vedasya punaḥ
GSD37gautdhcu:880: pratiṣedhaḥ veda eva nādhyāpayitavyaḥ iti niyamārthaḥ tataścāṅgādhyāpane na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:884: amuṣmai svadhetyuktvā yatpiṇḍodakādi pretebhyo dīyate tatsvadhāninayanam /
GSD37gautdhcu:888: sati sapiṇḍādibhiḥ pretakriyā na kartavyā, śāstracodanānarthakyaprasaṅgo mā bhūditi //
GSD37gautdhcu:891: upanayanādārabhya yo vidhiruktaḥ sa niyamasaṃjño bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:893: ato vā ārabhya niyamaḥ vratadhāraṇaṃ yo vakṣyate 'gnīndhanādiḥ sa niyamaḥ upanayanādiḥ kartavyaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:913: tatrāpi pradakṣiṇaṃ parītyāgnimityanena samiddhoma ukta ityuktam /

GSD37gautdhcu:935: āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ vrāhyaṃ vāyavyaṃ divyameva ca //
GSD37gautdhcu:937: āpo hiṣṭheti ca brāhmaṃ vāyavyaṃ gorajaḥ smṛtam //
GSD37gautdhcu:938: yattu syātsātapaṃ varṣaṃ divyaṃ snānaṃ taducyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:939: aśakto vāruṇe snāne āgneyādi samācaret // iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:954: godānaṃ nāma chandogānāṃ dvitīyaṃ vrataṃ anyeṣāmapi ṣoḍaśe varṣe dhārayitavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:957: godānāt prāk nityasnānaṃ na kuryāt, naimittikameva kartavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:959: eka iti vacanāt na tu gautamaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:966: bahirabhyantare vā yatra kutra cicchuddhadeśe kartavyamiti gautamamatam //
GSD37gautdhcu:967: idānīṃ prasaṅgāt tat sandhyopāsanaṃ kadā kathaṃ ca kartavyamityata āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:975: ato yadyapi tiṣṭhedityuktaṃ, tathāpi tiṣṭhannupāsīta, āsīna upāsīteti draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:978: paścimāṃ tu samāsīno malaṃ hanti divā kṛtam // iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:981: yaḥ kālo nakṣatrajyotiṣā saha vartata sa sajyotiḥ tasmin sajyotiṣi kāle ārambhaḥ kartavyaḥ
GSD37gautdhcu:983: tata ā jyotiṣo darśanāt-pūrvasyāmādityadarśanāt uttarasyāṃ nakṣatradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:984: ā jyotiṣa iti vaktavye darśanagrahaṇaṃ sampagartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:987: prajñāṃ yaśaśca kīrtiṃ ca brahmavarcasameva ca // iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:989: nanu ca 'uttareṣāṃ caitadavirodhi'; ityanena snātakasyāgnimata etanna
GSD37gautdhcu:992: kathaṃ ? sāyaṃśabdena rātrirucyate, prātaḥśabdena ca divasaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:999: tathā'hośanā-'sāyaṃ prātarudakaṃ gatvā pūto bhūtvā pavitreṇa mārjayitvā
GSD37gautdhcu:1000: āpohiṣṭhīyābhistisṛbhirabliṅgābhiḥ vāmadevyena ca, tataḥ śuco deśe
GSD37gautdhcu:1001_0: darbheṣvāsīno darbhāndhārayamāṇaḥ pratyaṅmukho vāgyata ātmānaṃ dhyātvā tataḥ sarecakaṣūrakakumbhakādīn
GSD37gautdhcu:1001_3: pratyagdakṣiṇodīcyāsu namaskṛtvā triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā punarapi pratīcīṃ diśaṃ namaskuryāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1005: yadi sandhyākālayorevāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt tadānīmekameva sūtraṃ kriyeta
GSD37gautdhcu:1014: madhu mākṣikaṃ, tasyābuddhipūrvabhakṣaṇe na doṣaḥ, 'akāmopanataṃ madhu vājasaneyake na duṣyati'; iti smṛtyantaradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1016: tatrāpyāturasyauṣadhārthaṃ gurorucchiṣṭasya māṃsasya bhakṣaṇe na doṣaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1017: 'sa cedavyādhīyīta kāmaṃ gurorucchiṣṭaṃ bhaiṣajyārthe sarvaṃ prāśnīyāt';
GSD37gautdhcu:1028: divāsvapno divā nidrāsevanaṃ, tadapyāturasya na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1034: gandhapratiśedhenaivāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ siddha iti cenna, viśeṣata eva lokaprasiddherna gandhasāmānyasya grahaṇaṃ bhavatīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1047: tāmbūlapatreṇāpi tanna kartavyaṃ 'paṅkadanto bhavedvratī'; iti smṛtyantaradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1048: harṣaḥ prītiḥ evaṃ ca taddhetūnāṃ nāṭakādīnāṃ prekṣaṇasyāpi pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ, taddarśane prītyutpatteḥ nivārāyetumaśakyatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1056: kutaḥ ? yadyācāryasyaiva grahaṇaṃ tadānīṃ ācāryadarśana iti vaktavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1058: tathāca smṛtyantaraṃ-'manyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ sakāśe saṃkucitastiṣṭhet'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1068: tathā cāpastambaḥ-'na smayeta yadi smayetāpapṛhya smayeteti brāhmaṇaṃ'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1075: prekṣaṇaṃ prakarṣeṇekṣaṇaṃ avayavanirūpaṇaṃ, na rūpamātradarśanaṃ, tasya nimiṣato vārayitumaśakyatvāt
GSD37gautdhcu:1086: evaṃ ca gurorapyanurūpā sevā na kartavyā /
GSD37gautdhcu:1093: ācāryasya tatputrasya ca tadbhāryāyāśca dīkṣitasya ca saṃjñāṃ pitrādikṛtāṃ noccārayet //
GSD37gautdhcu:1100: madyaṃ guḍamadhupiṣṭakṛtaṃ anyadapi yanmadakaraṃ yatsarvaṃ brāhmaṇo nityaṃ prāgapyupanayanādvarjayet
GSD37gautdhcu:1101: evaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ prāgupanayanādūrdhvaṃ ca brahmacaryāt paiṣṭīvarjitāyāḥ surāyā apratiṣedhaḥ, smṛtyantaradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1103: gauḍī mādhvī ca paiṣṭī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā /
GSD37gautdhcu:1104: yathaivaikā tathā sarvā na pātavyā dvijottamaiḥ // iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1112: uttiṣṭhetprathamaṃ cāsya caramaṃ caiva saṃviśet // iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1130: ācāryaṃ caiva tatputraṃ tadbhāryāṃ dīkṣitaṃ gurum /
GSD37gautdhcu:1131: pitaraṃ ca pitṛvyaṃ ca mātaraṃ mātulaṃ tathā //
GSD37gautdhcu:1132: hitaiṣiṇaṃ ca vidvāṃsaṃ śvaśuraṃ patimeva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1133: na brūyānnāmato vidvān mātuśca bhaginīṃ tathā //
GSD37gautdhcu:1134: yadi brūyāttu taṃ dhyātvā namaskṛtvā vadedatha // iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1138: śreyān hitaiṣī vayasā ca vṛddha iti draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1145: etāni vihāya tyaktvā pratiśravaṇaṃ prativacanaṃ dadyādityarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1147: adṛṣṭena guruṇā ājñāyāṃ dīyamānāyāṃ abhikramaṇaṃ tadabhimukhena gamanaṃ kuryādityarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1149: yadā guruḥ adho nīcaiḥ tiṣṭhet āsīta vā, tiryagvātasevā mūtrapurīṣotsargaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1153: kūpasthitaṃ guruṃ dṛṣṭvā taṭākasthaṃ tathaiva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1154: tiṣṭhedanyamukho bhūtvā śiṣyo dāsastathaiva ca // iti //

GSD37gautdhcu:1578: tathāca smṛtyantaram- 'grāmānte devagṛhe śūnyāgāre vṛkṣamūle vā'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1579: śīlagrahaṇaṃ ca kurvannetat jñāpayati, nāvaśyamevaṃ bhavet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1582: bhikṣā bhikṣyamāṇatvādannaṃ vāsaḥ kamaṇḍalvādiḥ, tadarthaṃ grāmaṃ gacchet
GSD37gautdhcu:1589: vṛtte śarāvasaṃpāte bhikṣāṃ nityaṃ yatiścaret // iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1591: anivṛttaṃ yasmin gṛhe pratyākhyātaṃ tasmindine tadgrahaṃ punarna praviśedityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1593: yathā'ha vasiṣṭhaḥ-'vidhūme sannamusale ekaśāṭhīparihito 'jinena vā'; iti
GSD37gautdhcu:1603: dharmayogaṃ pathipraśnaṃ svādhyāyaṃ ca tathaiva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1620: eke manyante pratigrahadoṣaparihārārthaṃ prahīṇaṃ yadrathyādau tyaktaṃ tatprakṣālya paridadhyāt nirṇijyeti pratyātmikaśaucaprāpaṇārtham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1627: cet, tatra jaṅgamavadha eva hiṃseti kecidvadanti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1633: apagate ṛtau dvitīyāṃ rātriṃ grāme na vaset /
GSD37gautdhcu:1636: apartugrahaṇādvarṣāsu kadācit dvitīyāmapi vasato na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1638: tataśca tasminvarṣākāle ekatraiva vasedanyatra na vasedityarthasiddham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1643: bījānāṃ vrīhyādīnāṃ vadhaṃ avahananādi na kuryāt //
GSD37gautdhcu:1659: evaṃca mūlaphalādyapi svalpamevāśnīyāt, smṛtyantaradarśanāt ṣoḍaśakṛtva eva 'vānaprasthasya ṣoḍaśa'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1682: araṇye 'pi phālakṛṣṭapradeśaṃ nākrāmeta, āvāsaṃ tatra na kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1683: ākrāmediti siddhe adhitiṣṭhediti vacanaṃ pramādādākramato doṣābhāvajñāpanārtham /
